segments.text: Do you have a United States R . N . license ( i . e . Registered Nurse license ) ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I haven't had a chance to take the exam as I have just arrived here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you tell me about your professional education ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: B :: All right . I graduated from the nursing school of Beijing Medical University . The nursing school offered such courses as nursing science , nursing psychology , nursing ethics , internal medicine , surgery , pediatrics , and so on .
segments.speaker: S2
